title: [Answer] Trash 2

.grader.py.body:
import re
from gradepad import StdoutCollector, Grader
import cs1robots

test_data = [
    ('trash3', {'0,0': 56}),
    ('trash4', {'0,0': 45}),
]

def grade(grader):
    collector = StdoutCollector()
    bot_test = grader.test('A robot exists.', 'Please make one robot. No more, no less. Try "bot = Robot()"?')
    tests = []
    
    with open('main.py', 'r') as f:
        main_src = f.read()
    
    for i, (world_name, beepers_dict) in enumerate(test_data):
        test = grader.test('Robot moved all beepers in the world to the bottom left corner of the world in "%s".' % world_name , 'Please pick up all beepers in the world, and drop them all in the bottom left corner of the world.')
        
        cs1robots.helper.unlock_world()
        cs1robots.load_world(world_name)
        cs1robots.helper.lock_world()
        
        with collector:
            if i == 0:
                import main
            else:
                exec(main_src)
                
            robots = cs1robots.helper.get_all_robots()
            bot_test.expect(len(robots) == 1)
            test.expect(cs1robots.helper.get_all_beepers_dict() == beepers_dict)
    
grader = Grader(locale='en')
grader.run(grade)
